nodes.bodyText: Is this PR meant to include user-facing changes? It feels like "server" may actually be more appropriate here, to be consistent with the modal title.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -151,57 +151,57 @@ export class ResetClusterButton extends React.Component {
{this.createButtonAndLabel()}
- {this.state.resetClusterModal && + {this.state.resetRuntimeModal && + loading={this.state.resetRuntimePending}> Reset Notebook Server?
Warning: Any unsaved changes to your notebooks may be lost - and your cluster will be offline for 5-10 minutes. + and your runtime will be offline for 5-10 minutes.

nodes.bodyText: Thanks, good call. You are correct that I did not intend for any user-visible changes here. I agree with "server" being better here, using that for completeness.
